main event: On August 15, 1965, an unidentified aerial object was observed over New Milford, Connecticut around 10:00 pm.
interesting points: The object was described as a very bright luminous object that moved at a very high rate of speed.
The object appeared to be gyrating or wobbling as it moved across the sky.
The object was observed for approximately 15 to 20 seconds before disappearing over the horizon.
Several other persons in the area also observed the object.
The witness had previously reported seeing similar unidentified objects and found the experience fascinating.
